summary: Frontend testing completed for mobile sidebar menu and TCS Financial Year dropdown features. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: === MOBILE SIDEBAR MENU TESTS (All passed) ===
Login as PE Desk (pedesk@smifs.com) - Works correctly
Mobile hamburger menu button visible on mobile viewport (375x800)
Mobile menu button has data-testid='mobile-menu-button'
Clicking hamburger menu opens sidebar overlay
Mobile sidebar shows user info (PE Desk Super Admin)
Mobile sidebar nav has data-testid='mobile-sidebar-nav'
Mobile sidebar is scrollable - can scroll to see all 27 menu items
All menu items visible including 'Database Backup' (PE Desk only)
Close button (X) visible with data-testid='close-menu-button'
Navigation works - clicking 'Clients' navigates to /clients
Navigation works - clicking 'Finance' navigates to /finance
Sidebar closes automatically after navigation (route change)
Logout button visible at bottom of mobile sidebar
=== TCS FINANCIAL YEAR DROPDOWN TESTS (All passed) ===
Finance page loads correctly on desktop viewport (1920x800)
TCS tab visible with data-testid='tcs-tab'
TCS FY dropdown visible with data-testid='tcs-fy-select'
FY dropdown shows 6 options (current + 5 previous years)
Default selection is current FY (2025-2026 since Jan 2026)
Export button shows 'Export FY 2025-2026' by default
Selecting FY 2023-2024 updates export button to 'Export FY 2023-2024'
Selecting FY 2020-2021 updates export button to 'Export FY 2020-2021'
Export button dynamically reflects selected financial year
critical_code_review_comments: Mobile sidebar implementation is clean with proper z-index handling (z-50)
Sidebar uses proper animation with translate-x transform
Body scroll is prevented when sidebar is open (overflow: hidden)
Sidebar closes on route change via useEffect hook
TCS FY dropdown correctly calculates current FY based on month (April start)
Export button text updates reactively based on selectedTcsFY state
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile sidebar menu and TCS FY dropdown features fully tested and working. Mobile sidebar opens via hamburger menu, is scrollable, shows all 27 menu items including Database Backup, and navigation works correctly. TCS tab on Finance page has FY dropdown with 6 options (current + 5 previous years) and export button dynamically updates to reflect selected FY.
